Uses of Class
png.PngChunk

  • Packages that use PngChunk 
    Package Description
    png
    Functionality for parsing and processing PNG image files is provided here.

    • Uses of PngChunk in png

      Subclasses of PngChunk in png 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  PngChunkITXT
      Extended to support an iTXt chunk in a PNG file, which stores international text data.
      class  PngChunkTEXT
      Represents a tEXt chunk in a PNG file, which stores original textual data.
      class  PngChunkZTXT
      Extended to support a zTXt (compressed textual data) chunk in a PNG file.
      Fields in png with type parameters of type PngChunk 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.List<PngChunk> ChunkHandler.chunks 
      private java.util.List<PngChunk> ChunkDirectory.chunks 
      Methods in png that return PngChunk 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private PngChunk ChunkHandler.addChunk(ChunkType chunkType, long length, byte[] typeBytes, int crc32, byte[] data)
      Adds a parsed chunk to the internal chunk collection.
      PngChunk ChunkDirectory.findEntryByID(int id)
      Returns a PngChunk entry based on the specified ID.
      Methods in png that return types with arguments of type PngChunk 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<PngChunk> ChunkHandler.getChunks()
      Retrieves a list of chunks that have been extracted.
      java.util.Optional<java.util.List<PngChunk>> ChunkHandler.getTextualData()
      Retrieves all textual metadata chunks from the PNG file as an unmodifiable list.
      java.util.Iterator<PngChunk> ChunkDirectory.iterator()
      Retrieves an iterator to navigate through a collection of PngChunk objects.
      Methods in png with parameters of type PngChunk 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean ChunkDirectory.add(PngChunk chunk)
      Adds a new PngChunk entry to this Directory.
      boolean ChunkDirectory.remove(PngChunk chunk)
      Removes an entry from this Directory.
